api-table-insert.name: api-table-insert
api-table-insert.content:
gn api_table_insert x y
 check is_str x
 check is_obj y
 check same y.id -1
 
 let o db_page_escape y
 
 assign o.id run api_table_id x
  
 while true
  let login call login_init
  let response run api_post "table-insert" login.mail login.password x o

  if is_true response.result   
   ret db_page_unescape o
   
  let error response.error
  
  if is_obj error
   let error error.errorInfo
   
   if is_arr error
    if gt error.length 1
     let error at error 1
     
     if same error 1062
      assign o.id inc o.id
      
      cont
    end
   end
  end
   
  run api_report "api-table-insert" response
  stop
 end
end

base36-decode.name: base36-decode
base36-decode.content:
fn base36_decode x
 check is_str x
 
 let n mod x.length 4
 
 check same n 0
 
 let input explode x
 let output arr
 
 while is_full input
  let b arr
  
  fornum 4
   let s shift input
   
   if same s "0"
    if is_empty b
     cont
   end
   
   push b s
  end
  
  if is_empty b
   push b "0"
   
  let s implode b
  let n from_base36 s
  let c chr n
  
  push output c
 end

 ret implode output
end

base36-encode.name: base36-encode
base36-encode.content:
fn base36_encode x
 check is_str x
  
 let a arr
 
 fornum x.length
  let v at x i
  let n asc v
  let s to_base36 n
  let s pad_l s "0" 4
  
  push a s
 end
 
 ret implode a
end

baserow-cache.name: baserow-cache
baserow-cache.content:
gn baserow_cache x y:spread
 check is_xn x

 let url "https://mabynogy.org/"
 
 fn local_set x y
  check is_str x
  check is_def x
  
  if is_null y
   stop

  let time call time_get
  let payload y
  let entry obj time payload
  let entry to_json entry

  storage_set x entry
 end
 
 fn local_get x
  check is_str x
  
  let entry storage_get x
  
  if is_empty entry
   ret null
   
  let entry from_json entry
   
  ret entry.payload
 end

 gn remote_set x y
  check is_str x
  check is_def y

  if is_null y
   stop
  
  let url concat url "cache-set.php"
  let method "post"
  let headers obj
  let key x
  let payload y
  let body obj key payload

  set headers "content-type" "application/json" 

  let o obj url method headers body  
  let result run fetch_url o
  
  if is_empty result
   ret
   
  api_report "remote-set" result
 end
 
 gn remote_get x
  check is_str x
  
  let u encodeURIComponent x
  let u concat "u=" u
  let url concat url "cache-get.php?" u  
  let r run fetch_url url

  if is_null r
   ret r

  //api_report "remote-get" r
  
  ret r
 end

 gn cache_set x y
  check is_str x
  check is_def y
  
  //log "cache-set" x y
  
  gn_run local_set nop x y
  gn_run remote_set nop x y
 end
 
 gn cache_get x
  check is_str x
  
  let r local_get x
  
  if not is_null r
   ret r
  
  let r run remote_get x

  if not is_null r
   local_set x r
   
  ret r
 end
 
 let key to_json y
 let key concat key x.name 
 let key run digest key
 let key head key 16
 let key concat "baserow_cache_" key
 
 let r run cache_get key
 
 if not is_null r
  ret r
 
 let baserow run baserow_init
 let r run xn_call x baserow y:spread
 
 run cache_set key r
 
 ret r
end

 fn compare_name x y

  check is_obj y
  
  ret compare x.name y.name
 end
 
 if is_undef y
  let r arr
  let a run baserow_databases x
  
  forof a
   let id v.id
   let database_name v.name
   
   forof run baserow_database_tables x id
    let value unset v "order"
    
    assign value.database_name database_name
    push r value
   end
  end

  sort r compare_name
  
  ret r
 end
 
 check is_uint y
 
 let url "/api/database/tables/database/"
 let url concat url y "/"
 let r run baserow_fetch x url 
 
 sort r compare_name

end

  let url "https://mabynogy.org"
  let url concat url "/token-get.php"
  let token run fetch_url url
  let url "https://br.mabynogy.org"
  
  ret obj url token
 end
 
 let a x
 let x at a 0
 let y at a 1
 let z at a 2
 
 check is_str x
 check is_str y
 check is_str z

 gn get_token x y z
  check is_str x
  check is_str y
  check is_str z
  
  let url concat z "/api/user/token-auth/"
  let method "post"
  let headers obj
  let email x
  let password y
  let body obj email password

  set headers "content-type" "application/json" 

  let o obj url method headers body
  let result run fetch_url o
  
  ret result.token
 end
 
 let url z
 let token run get_token x y url
 
 ret obj url token
end

baserow-invalidate.name: baserow-invalidate
baserow-invalidate.content:
gn baserow_invalidate
 fn invalidate_local
  forof call storage_keys
   if not match_l v "baserow_cache_"
    cont
    
   let value storage_get v
   let value from_json value
   let time value.time
   let now call time_get
   let delay sub now time
   let timeout mul 1 60 60
   
   if gt delay timeout
    storage_remove v
  end
 end
 
 gn invalidate_remote
  let url "https://mabynogy.org/"
  let url concat url "/cache-invalidate.php"  
  let paths run fetch_url url
  
  forof paths
   log "invalidate" v
  end
 end
 
 invalidate_local 
 run invalidate_remote
end

baserow-table.name: baserow-table
baserow-table.content:
gn baserow_table x y
 check is_obj x
 check is_uint y
 
 fn get_name x y
  check is_arr x
  check is_uint y
  
  forof x
   if same v.id y
    if is_str v.name
     ret v.name
  end

  stop
 end

 let r arr
 let fields run baserow_table_fields x y
 let rows run baserow_table_rows x y
 
 forof rows
  let row v
  let o obj
  
  forin row
   let v get row k
   
   if match_l k "field_"
    let n strip_l k "field_"
    let n to_uint n
    let name get_name fields n
    
    set o name v
   else
    set o k v 
  end
  
  push r o
 end
 
 tbl_column_remove r "order"
 
 if is_empty r
  ret r
 
 forof tbl_columns r
  let column v
  var empty true
  
  forof r
   let value get v column
   
   if is_composite value
    if is_full value
     assign empty false
     
     brk
    end
   else
    assign empty false
  end
  
  if empty
   tbl_column_remove r column
 end

 ret r 
end

gn baserow_table_rows x y
 check is_obj x
 check is_uint y

 let r arr
 let url "/api/database/rows/table/"
 let url concat url y "/"

 var page 1
  
 while true
  let query concat url "?page=" page  
  let data run baserow_fetch x query
  let results data.results

  append r results
  
  if is_null data.next
   brk
     
  assign page inc page
 end
  
 ret r
end

cell-init.name: cell-init
cell-init.content:
fn cell_init x
 check is_def x
 
 if is_str x
  let s trim_r x
  
  if different s x
   ret cell_init s
 end

 if is_str x
  let s trim x
  
  if different s x
   if is_date s
    ret cell_init s
  end
 end

 if is_null x
  ret ""

 if is_num x
  ret to_fixed x
  
 if is_url x
  ret cell_url x

 if is_date x
  ret cell_time x
 
 if is_str x
  ret x
  
 if is_arr x
  if is_empty x
   ret ""
   
  let r dom_table null
  let tr dom_tr r
  
  forof x
   let td dom_td tr
   let cell cell_node v
   
   if is_obj cell    
    dom_push td cell
    
    cont
   end
   
   let s to_json v
   
   dom_text td s
  end

  ret r
 end
 
 let r cell_node x
 
 if not is_null r
  ret r
 
 ret to_json x 
end

  ret css_init "indigo"
  
 assign global.thickness from_mw "0.1mw"
 assign global.border concat thickness " solid gray"
 assign global.font_family "monospace"
 assign global.font_size from_mw "1.4mw"
 assign global.padding from_mw "0.4mw"
 assign global.button from_mw "9mw"
 assign global.border concat thickness " solid gainsboro"
 assign global.line from_mw "1.8mw"

 let s from_mw "0.4mw"
 
 assign global.shadow concat s " " s " " s " gray" 
 
 if mobile
  assign global.border_radius from_mw "0.5mw"
  assign global.border_radius_medium from_mw "0.4mw"
  assign global.border_radius_small from_mw "0.2mw"

  assign global.field_width from_mw "19mw"
  assign global.field_width_medium from_mw "17mw"
  assign global.field_width_small from_mw "8mw"
  assign global.field_height from_mw "8mw"
 else
  assign global.border_radius from_mw "0.9mw"
  assign global.border_radius_medium from_mw "0.7mw"
  assign global.border_radius_small from_mw "0.4mw"
  
  assign global.field_width from_mw "33mw"
  assign global.field_width_medium from_mw "24mw"
  assign global.field_width_small from_mw "13mw"
  assign global.field_height from_mw "20mw"
 end

 //dom_css "*" "outline" "thin solid red"

digest.name: digest
digest.content:
gn digest x
 check is_str x
 
 var r null
 
 fn on_data x
  check is_obj x
  
  assign r x
 end

 let encoder new TextEncoder
 let data encoder.encode x
 let promise crypto.subtle.digest "sha-256" data
 
 promise.then on_data
 
 while is_null r
  yield
 end
 
 let decoder new TextDecoder
 let r decoder.decode r 
 let r to_base36 r 
 
 ret r
end

dir-copy.name: dir-copy
dir-copy.content:
fn dir_copy x y
 check is_str x
 check is_str x
 
 check is_dir x
 check is_dir y
 
 let source path_real x
 let target path_real y
 
 forof dir_read_rec source
  let relative path_fix source
  let relative strip_l v relative
  
  let left v
  let right path_concat target relative
  let directory path_dir right
  
  if not is_dir directory   
   dir_make directory
   
  file_copy left right
 end
end

dlg-loading.name: dlg-loading
dlg-loading.content:
fn dlg_loading x
 if is_undef x
  ret dlg_loading 10

 let divide div
 let result call dom_dialog body
 let container dom_div result "Loading..."
 let div2 dom_div result
 let progress dom_div div2
 let frequency 0.4
 let begin call time_now
 
 dom_height progress "1vw"
 dom_padding_top div2 spacing
 dom_color_background progress "lightgray"
 
 fn on_timer
  let visibity dom_visible container
  
  if is_empty visibity
   dom_visible container "hidden"
  elseif same visibity "visible"
   dom_visible container "hidden"
  elseif same visibity "hidden"
   dom_visible container "visible"
  else
   stop
  
  let now call time_now
  var delay sub now begin  
  
  if gte delay x
   assign delay x
   
  let ratio div delay x
  let width mul div2.offsetWidth ratio
  let width to_vw width
  
  dom_width progress width
  
  if result.open
   timer_timeout on_timer frequency
 end
 
 dom_visible container "visible"
 
 result.show

 let y call dom_window_height 
 let y sub y result.offsetHeight
 let y div y 2
 let y to_vw y
 
 dom_top result y
 timer_timeout on_timer frequency
   
 ret result
end

  check is_obj x

  let key to_lower y.key
  
  if same key "enter"
   let onenter x.onenter
   
   if is_fn onenter
    let focus document.activeElement
    let focus dom_tag focus
    
    if different focus "textarea"
     onenter x
   end
  end
 end

 assign r.onkeypress partial on_key_press r
 
 ret r
end

fn dom_over x y z
 check is_obj x
 check is_str y
 check is_cool z
 
 var previous null
 
 fn on_enter x y z
  check is_obj x
  check is_str y
  check is_cool z
  
  if is_null previous
   assign previous get x.style y
  
  set x.style y z
 end

 fn on_leave x y
  check is_obj x
  check is_str y
  
  if not is_null previous  
   set x.style y previous
 end
 
 let enter partial on_enter x y z
 let leave partial on_leave x y

 x.addEventListener "mouseenter" enter
 x.addEventListener "mouseleave" leave
end

edf-load.name: edf-load
edf-load.content:
fn edf_load x
 check is_file x
 
 let a file_read x "binary"
 let a explode a

 let version shift a 8
 let version implode version
 let version trim version

 let patient shift a 80
 let patient implode patient 

 let recording shift a 80
 let recording implode recording 

 let date shift a 8
 let date implode date 

 let time shift a 8
 let time implode time 

 let header_length shift a 8
 let header_length implode header_length 
 let header_length trim header_length 
 let header_length to_uint header_length
 
 let reserved shift a 44
 let reserved implode reserved 
 
 let data_count shift a 8
 let data_count implode data_count
 let data_count trim data_count
 let data_count to_uint data_count

 let data_duration shift a 8
 let data_duration implode data_duration
 let data_duration trim data_duration
 let data_duration to_uint data_duration

 let signal_count shift a 4
 let signal_count implode signal_count
 let signal_count trim signal_count
 let signal_count to_uint signal_count

 fn shift_signal x
  check is_uint x
  
  let r arr
  
  fornum signal_count
   let v shift a x
   let v implode v
   let v trim v
   
   if is_numeric v
    let v to_num v
    
    push r v
   elseif is_empty v
    push r null
   else
    push r v
   end
  end
  
  ret r
 end
 
 let labels shift_signal 16
 let transducers shift_signal 80
 let physical_dimensions shift_signal 8
 let physical_mins shift_signal 8
 let physical_maxs shift_signal 8
 let digital_mins shift_signal 8
 let digital_maxs shift_signal 8
 let prefilterings shift_signal 80
 let sample_counts shift_signal 8
 let reserveds shift_signal 32
 
 let signals arr
 
 fornum signal_count
  let label shift labels
  let transducer shift transducers
  let physical_dimension shift physical_dimensions
  let physical_min shift physical_mins
  let physical_max shift physical_maxs
  let digital_min shift digital_mins
  let digital_max shift digital_maxs
  let prefiltering shift prefilterings
  let sample_count shift sample_counts
  let reserved shift reserveds
  
  let signal obj label transducer physical_dimension physical_min physical_max digital_min digital_max prefiltering sample_count reserved
  
  push signals signal
 end
 
 var index 0
 
 forof signals
  let count v.sample_count
  let data arr
  
  fornum count
   let high at a index
   
   assign index inc index
      
   let low at a index

   assign index inc index
   
   let high asc high   
   let low asc low
   let n mul high 256
   let n add n low
   
   push data n
  end
 end

 ret obj version patient recording date time header_length reserved data_count data_duration signal_count signals
end

elinks.content:
fn elinks x
 check is_str x
 
 let lines os_execute "elinks" "-no-numbering" x
 let lines split lines
 let html arr
 
 while is_full lines
  let line shift lines
  let line trim_r line
  
  if same line "References"
   shift lines 2
   
   brk
  end
  
  push html line
 end
 
 let urls arr

 forof lines
  let url trim v
  let url strip_l url "."
  let url trim url
  
  push urls url
 end 
 
 let html join html
 let html trim_r html
 
 ret obj html urls
end

fn env_upload x y
 check is_obj x

 let login x.login
 let home x.home

 let tmp x.tmp
 let install path_concat prg "prg-install" "prg-install"

 forof dir_read y is_fs
  let base path_base v
  let source v
  let target path_concat home base
  let login_home concat login ":" home
  let login_target concat login ":" target
  
  ssh login "rm" "--recursive" "--force" target  

  rsync "--recursive" "--perms" v login_home
  rsync "--recursive" "--perms" "data-php/*" login_target
 end
 
 let duration call time_now

 let duration space "website" duration
 
 flower duration

 ssh login "sudo" "rm" "--recursive" "--force" prg 
 ssh login "mkdir" "--parents" prg
 ssh login "mkdir" "--parents" tmp
 
 let login_hdd concat login ":" hdd

 rsync "--recursive" "--perms" prg login_hdd

 ssh login install
end

fetch-url.name: fetch-url
fetch-url.content:
gn fetch_url x
 if is_str x
  let url x
  let o obj url
  
  ret run fetch_url o
 end
 
 check is_obj x
 
 var result null
 
 fn on_response x
  check is_obj x
  
  ret call x.text
 end

 fn on_data x
  check is_str x
  
  assign result x
 end
 
 let timeout 8
 let url x.url
 var headers null
 var method get x "method" "get"
 var body null

 if has x "headers"
  assign headers x.headers
 
 if has x "body"
  assign body x.body
  
 let option obj
 
 assign option.method method
 
 if not is_null headers
  assign option.headers headers 
 
 if not is_null body
  assign option.body to_json body
  
 let promise fetch url option
 let promise promise.then on_response
 
 promise.then on_data

 let begin call time_now
 
 while is_null result
  let end call time_now
  let time sub end begin
  
  if gt time timeout
   stop

  yield
 end
 
 if is_json result
  ret from_json result
 
 ret result
end

food-load.name: food-load
food-load.content:
fn food_load
 fn decode x
  check is_arr x
  
  let r arr
  
  forof x
   let o obj
   
   assign o.date time_parse v.date
   
   let weight strip_r v.weight "g"
   let weight to_num weight
   let weight div weight 100  
   let energy strip_r v.energy "kcal"
   let energy to_num energy
   let energy mul weight energy
   let energy trunc energy

   assign o.energy energy
   
   push r o
  end

  ret r
 end
 
 let r arr
 let path "/home/mabynogy/place-hdd/room-personal/case-food/log.txt"
 let content file_read path
 let t arr
 
 tbl_import_wsl t content
 
 let t decode t
 let day mul 24 60 60
 let o obj
  
 forof t
  let n div v.date day
  let n trunc n
  let key to_str n
  
  if has o key
   let energy get o key
   let energy add energy v.energy
   
   set o key energy
  else
   put o key v.energy
  end
 end
 
 forin o
  let date to_uint k
  let date mul date day
  let energy get o k
  let o obj date energy
  
  push r o
 end
 
 ret r
end

 elseif contain agent "iphone"
  ret "iphone"
 elseif contain agent "firefox"

  ret "edge"

  ret "safari"
 else
  ret "unknown"
end

 while true
  let now call time_now
  let delay sub now begin
  
  if gte delay x
   brk
  
  yield
 end
end

 elseif same y.length 2
  let y_ at y 0

  let y y_
  
  check is_cool y
  check is_str z
 
  let n grid_index x y

  forof x.table.children

   dom_align td z
  end
 else
  stop
end

grid-init.name: grid-init
grid-init.content:
fn grid_init x y:spread  
 check is_obj x
 
 let columns arr
 let titles y
 let table dom_table x
 let tr dom_tr table
 let headers obj
 let tooltip null
 
 forof y
  let column to_lower v  
  var key column
  let th dom_th tr
  let div dom_div th v
  
  if same key "#"
   assign key "sharp"

  push columns key
  put headers key th
  
  dom_padding th padding
  dom_border th border  
 end

 assign r obj columns titles table headers tooltip

 grid_init_sort r
 
 ret r
end

grid-init-sort.name: grid-init-sort
grid-init-sort.content:
fn grid_init_sort x
 check is_obj x
 
 let up ""
 let down ""
 let grid x
 let table grid.table
 let children table.children
 let headers grid.headers

 let column null
 let order null
 let rows arr

 assign grid.sorting obj column order rows  
 
 let sorting grid.sorting
 
 fn reset
  forin get_keys headers
   let i to_i k
   let value get_values headers
   let value at value i
   let title at grid.titles i
   
   dom_text value title
  end
  
  while gt children.length 1
   let tr children.item 1
    
   dom_remove tr
  end
  
  forof sorting.rows
   dom_push table v
  end
 end
 
 fn save
  let rows sorting.rows
  
  if is_full sorting.rows
   ret
   
  fornum children.length
   if same i 0
    cont
   
   let row children.item i
   
   push rows row
  end
 end
 
 fn compare_node x y z
  check is_uint x
  check is_obj y
  check is_obj z
  
  let tdy y.children.item x
  let tdz z.children.item x
  let divy tdy.children.item 0
  let divz tdz.children.item 0
  
  var sy dom_text divy
  var sz dom_text divz
  
  if is_empty sy
   assign sy dom_html divy

  if is_empty sz
   assign sz dom_html divz
   
  let sy to_lower sy  
  let sz to_lower sz
  
  let numericy is_numeric sy
  let numericz is_numeric sz

  if and numericy numericz
   let numy to_num sy
   let numz to_num sz
   
   ret compare numy numz
  end
  
  ret compare sy sz
 end
 
 fn on_click x
  check is_str x
  
  //dom_display grid.table "none"
  
  if is_obj grid.tooltip
   dom_remove grid.tooltip
   
   assign grid.tooltip null
  end
  
  save
  reset
  
  if is_null sorting.column
   assign sorting.column x
   assign sorting.order "descending"
  elseif same sorting.column x  
   if same sorting.order "descending"
    assign sorting.order "ascending"
   elseif same sorting.order "ascending"
    assign sorting.column null
    assign sorting.order null

    //dom_display grid.table "block"
    
    ret
   else
    stop
  else
   assign sorting.column x
   assign sorting.order "descending"
  end
   
  let index get_keys headers
  let index find index x
  let header get headers x
  var title at grid.titles index
  
  assign title concat title " "
  
  if same sorting.order "descending"
   assign title concat title down
  elseif same sorting.order "ascending"
   assign title concat title up
  else
   stop
  
  dom_text header title
  
  let nodes arr
  
  while gt children.length 1
   let tr children.item 1
   
   dom_remove tr
   push nodes tr
  end
  
  let compare partial compare_node index
  
  sort nodes compare
  
  if same sorting.order "descending"
   reverse nodes
  elseif same sorting.order "ascending"
  else
   stop
  
  forof nodes
   dom_push table v
  end

  //dom_display grid.table "block"
 end
  
 forin headers
  let v get headers k
  
  dom_over v "cursor" "pointer"
  assign v.onclick partial on_click k
 end 
end

grid-push.name: grid-push
grid-push.content:
fn grid_push x
 check is_obj x
 
 let grid x
 
 fn on_tr_enter x
  check is_obj x
  
  forin x
   let v get x k
   let td dom_parent v
   
   dom_color_background td "whitesmoke"
  end
 end
 
 fn on_tr_leave x
  check is_obj x

  forin x
   let v get x k
   let td dom_parent v   
   
   dom_style_remove td "background-color"
  end
 end
 
 fn on_div_enter x
  check is_obj x
  
  if not is_null grid.tooltip
   dom_remove grid.tooltip

  var html x.on_tooltip
  
  if is_null x.on_tooltip
   if dom_overflown x
    assign html dom_html x
   else
    ret
  elseif is_fn html
   assign html html x
  
  if is_empty html
   ret

  assign grid.tooltip dom_div null

  let tooltip grid.tooltip
  let td dom_parent x
  
  dom_html tooltip html
  dom_unshift td tooltip
  dom_padding tooltip padding
  dom_shadow tooltip shadow
  
  let div front tooltip.children

  dom_position tooltip "absolute"
  dom_color_background tooltip "white"
  dom_border tooltip border
  
  let vgap call dom_line_height  
  let vgap mul vgap 5
  
  let tweak from_vw "1.3vw"
    
  let rect dom_rect td
  
  let x add rect.x scrollX  
  let y add rect.y scrollY vgap
  
  let width tooltip.offsetWidth
  let height tooltip.offsetHeight

  let window_width call dom_window_width
  let window_height call dom_window_height
  
  var x x
  var y y
  
  let right add x width
  let bottom add y height

  let scroll_right add scrollX window_width
  let scroll_right sub scroll_right tweak
  let scroll_bottom add scrollY window_height
  let scroll_bottom sub scroll_bottom tweak
  
  if gt right scroll_right
   assign x sub scroll_right width
   
   if lt x 0
    assign x 0
  end

  if gt bottom scroll_bottom
   assign y sub scroll_bottom height
   
   if lt y 0
    assign y 0
  end
  
  if lt x scrollX
   assign x scrollX
  
  if lt y scrollY
   assign y scrollY
  
  let x to_vw x
  let y to_vw y
  
  dom_left tooltip x
  dom_top tooltip y
  
  assign tooltip.onmouseleave on_tooltip_leave
 end

 fn on_tooltip_leave x
  check is_obj x
  
  dom_remove grid.tooltip
  
  assign grid.tooltip null
 end
 
 let r obj
 let tr dom_tr x.table
 
 assign tr.onmouseenter partial on_tr_enter r
 assign tr.onmouseleave partial on_tr_leave r

 forof x.columns
  let td dom_td tr
  let div dom_div td

  dom_padding td padding
  dom_border td border

  assign div.onmouseenter partial on_div_enter div
  assign div.on_tooltip null
  
  put r v div
 end
 
 ret r
end

fn is_readable x
 if is_file x
  var fd null

  try
   assign fd fs.openSync x
  catch
   ret false
  end
  
  let n file_size x
  
  if gt n 0
   let buffer Buffer.alloc 1
   
   try
    fs.readSync fd buffer
   catch
    fs.closeSync fd
    
    ret false
   end
  end
    
  fs.closeSync fd
  
  ret true 
 elseif is_dir x
  try
   fs.readdirSync x
  catch
   ret false
  end
  
  ret true
 else
  ret false
end

fn main x y:spread
 check is_str x
 
 fn is_executable x
  if not is_file x
   ret false
   
  let s file_read x
  
  if match_l s "#!"
   ret true
  
  if match_l s "ELF"
   ret true
   
  ret false
 end
 
 fn change_mod x
  let s to_lit x

  log "dir" s
  
  os_system "sudo" "chmod" "777" x

  forof dir_read x is_fs
   let s to_lit v
   
   if is_file v
    os_system "sudo" "chmod" "777" v
    
    if is_executable v
     log "executable" s
    else
     os_system "sudo" "chmod" "-x" v
     
     log "file" s
    end    
   elseif is_dir v
    change_mod v
   end
  end
 end
 
 change_mod x
end

  let sx to_lit x
  
  log "match" sx
   
  forof split s
   let s to_lit s

  end

 fn find x y

  if is_file x

main-14.name: main
main-14.content:
fn main x:spread
 fn install
  os_execute "sudo" "rm" "/usr/bin/prg-*"
  
  let a dir_read "/home/mabynogy/place-hdd/room-prg" is_dir
  
  var n 0
  
  forof a
   let base path_base v

   if not match_l base "prg-"
    cont

   let path path_concat v base
   
   if not is_file path
    cont
   
   check is_file path
   
   let target path_concat "/usr/bin" base
   
   os_system "sudo" "cp" path target
   
   assign n inc n
  end
  
  log "prg" n
  
  beep
 end
 
 fn load x
  if is_undef x
   ret load "/home/mabynogy/place-hdd/room-prg"
  
  check is_str x
  
  var r ""
  
  forof dir_read_rec x
   let s file_read v
   
   assign r concat r v
   assign r concat r s
  end
  
  ret r
 end

 if not contain x "--watch"
  install
  
  ret
 end

 var data ""
 
 while true
  let v call load
  
  if same v data
   sleep 1
  else
   install
   
   assign data v

   let a split v
   
   log "sloc" a.length   
  end
 end
end

  check is_arr x
  check is_str y
  check is_num z
  check is_str a
  
  let label y
  let value concat z a
  let o obj label value
  
  push x o  
 end
 
 fn has_one_month x
  check is_uint x
  
  let now call time_get
  let period sub now x
  let month mul 30 24 60 60
  
  ret lte period month  
 end

 fn has_one_week x
  check is_uint x
  
  let now call time_get
  let period sub now x
  let week mul 7 24 60 60
  
  ret lte period week  
 end

 let s tbl_with_order t

match.name: match
match.content:
fn match x y
 check is_str x
 check is_str y
 
 let a arr
 
 forof y
  if is_alnum v
   push a v
  elseif same v "?"
   push a "(.)"
  elseif same v "*"
   push a "(.*)"
  else
   let s concat "\\" v
   
   push a s
  end
 end
 
 let s implode a
 let pattern concat "^" s "$"
 let o new RegExp pattern
 
 ret o.test x
end

measure-average.name: measure-average
measure-average.content:
fn measure_average x y
 check is_arr x
 check is_str y
 
 let end call time_get
 let begin back x
 let begin begin.date
 let time sub end begin
 var sum 0
 
 forof x
  let value get v y
  
  assign sum add sum value
 end
 
 let count x.length
 let r div sum count
 
 if gt r 1000
  let r trunc r
  
  ret r
 end
 
 let r to_fixed r 1
 let r to_num r
 
 ret r
end

fn node_binary
 let r "/tmp/node"
 let url call node_url
 let gz url_parse url
 let gz path_base gz.pathname
 let tar strip_r gz ".gz"
 let dir strip_r tar ".tar"
 let binary path_concat dir "bin/node"
 
 fs_remove r

 fs_remove tar
 fs_remove dir
 fs_remove binary
 
 os_system "wget" "--quiet" url
 os_system "gzip" "--decompress" gz

 ret r
end

node-url.name: node-url
node-url.content:
fn node_url
 let latest "https://nodejs.org/dist/latest/"
 let urls elinks latest
 let urls urls.urls
 
 forof urls
  let file split v "/"
  let file back file
  
  if match_r file "linux-x64.tar.gz"
   ret concat latest file
 end
 
 stop
end

obj-sort.name: obj-sort
obj-sort.content:
fn obj_sort x y
 check is_obj x
 
 if is_undef y
  ret obj_sort x compare
 
 check is_fn y
 
 let r obj
 let a arr

 forin x
  let key k
  let value get x k
  let o obj key value
  
  push a o  
 end
 
 sort a y
 
 forof a
  let key v.key
  let value v.value
  
  put r key value
 end
 
 ret r
end

 let err to_str streams.stderr

page-file.name: page-file
page-file.content:
gn page_file x y
 check is_obj x
 check is_str y
 
 fn on_click x
  check is_str x
  
  assign location.hash x
  
  location.reload
 end
 
 let pre dom_by_tag body "pre"
 let pre front pre

 dom_remove pre

 let entry get x y
 let content entry.content
 
 //breadcrumb
 
 let table dom_table body
 let tr dom_tr table
 let breadcrumb dom_td tr
 let nav dom_td tr
 let url_branch concat "/?b=" entry.branch
 
 dom_width table "100%"
 dom_align nav "right"
 dom_a breadcrumb "Home" "/"
 dom_separator breadcrumb ">"
 dom_a breadcrumb entry.branch url_branch
 dom_separator breadcrumb ">"
 dom_b breadcrumb entry.name
 dom_br body
 
 //nav
 
 let url_previous sitemap_previous x y
 let url_previous concat "/" url_previous "/"
 let url_next sitemap_next x y
 let url_next concat "/" url_next "/"
 
 dom_a nav "<<" url_previous
 dom_separator nav " | "
 dom_a nav ">>" url_next 
 
 //code
 
 let lines split content
 let table dom_table body
 
 forin lines
  let i to_i k
  let v at lines i  
  let n inc i
  let tr dom_tr table
  let line_number dom_td tr
  let code dom_td tr

  dom_over tr "background-color" "whitesmoke"  
  dom_valign line_number "top"
  dom_align line_number "right"

  let anchor concat "#" n
  let a dom_a line_number n anchor
  
  assign a.id n
  assign a.onclick partial on_click anchor
  
  let tokens scan v
  let div dom_div code
  
  dom_span div " "  
  dom_white_space div "pre-wrap"
  
  forin tokens
   let i to_i k
   let v at tokens i
   let node syntax_attribute v

   dom_push div node
  end
  
  if same location.hash anchor
   line_number.scrollIntoView
    
   dom_color_background tr "whitesmoke"
   dom_bold line_number
  end
 end
end

page-keyword.name: page-keyword
page-keyword.content:
gn page_keyword x y
 check is_obj x
 check is_str y
 
 let keyword y
 
 gn load_data x
  check is_obj x
  
  let r arr

  forin x
   let v get x k
   let file v  
   let content get_content file.content
   
   if not contain content keyword
    cont
    
   let a scan content
   let a group_line a

   forin a
    let i to_i k
    let v at a i
    let n inc i
    
    if not match_word v keyword
     cont
    
    let line v
    let o obj file line n
    
    push r o
   end
   
   yield
  end
  
  ret r
 end
 
 fn push_row x y z a
  check is_obj x
  check is_obj y
  check is_arr z
  check is_uint a
  
  let url_line concat "/" y.id "/"
  let url_line concat url_line "#" a
  let url_branch concat "/?b=" y.branch
  let lang path_ext y.path
  
  dom_a x.line a url_line true
  dom_word_break x.code "break-word"
  dom_white_space x.code "pre-wrap"
  
  forof z    
   let node syntax_attribute v

   if contain v keyword
    let fore dom_color node
    var back dom_color_background node
    let bold dom_font_weight node
    
    if is_empty back
     assign back "transparent"
        
    dom_color node "white"
    dom_color_background node "indigo"
    dom_bold_no node
    
    dom_over node "color" fore
    dom_over node "background-color" back
    dom_over node "font-weight" bold
   end
   
   dom_push x.code node
  end

  dom_text x.lang lang
  dom_text x.name y.name
  dom_a x.branch y.branch url_branch true
 end
 
 fn match_word x y
  check is_arr x
  check is_str y
  
  forof x
   if contain v y
    ret true
  end
  
  ret false
 end

 fn get_content x
  check is_str x
  
  let a arr
  
  forof split x
   let s trim v
   
   push a s
  end
  
  ret join a
 end
 
 //title
 
 assign document.title keyword
 
 let loading call dlg_loading 30

 //breadcrumb
 
 let breadcrumb dom_div body
 
 dom_a breadcrumb "Home" "/"
 dom_separator breadcrumb ">"
 dom_span breadcrumb "Keywords"
 dom_separator breadcrumb ">"
 dom_b breadcrumb keyword
 dom_br body
 
 let grid grid_init body "#" "line" "code" "lang" "name" "branch"
 var n 1
 
 dom_display grid.table "none"
 
 let key y
 let key run digest key
 let key head key 16
 let key concat "doc_cache_" key
 
 var data storage_get key
 
 if is_empty data
  assign data run load_data x
  
  let s to_json data
  
  try  
   storage_set key s
  catch
  end
 else
  assign data from_json data
 
 forin data
  let i to_i k
  let v at data i
  let n inc i
  let row grid_push grid
  
  push_row row v.file v.line v.n
  dom_text row.sharp n
  
  yield
 end

 grid_align grid "sharp" "right"
 grid_align grid "line" "right"
 grid_ellipsis grid

 dom_display grid.table "block"
 
 dom_remove loading 
end

page-row.name: page-row
page-row.content:
gn page_row x y
 check is_uint x
 check is_uint y

 fn on_enter x y
  check is_obj x
  check is_obj y
  
  dom_br body
  
  let pre call dom_pre
  let s to_dump y
  
  dom_white_space pre "pre-wrap"
  dom_word_break pre "break-word"
  dom_text pre s
  
  dom_remove x
 end
 
 let table run baserow_cache baserow_database_table x
 let name table.name
 let data run baserow_cache baserow_table x
 let count data.length
 let data at data y
 let title get_values data
 let title at title 1
 let table dom_table body
 let tr dom_tr table
 let breadcrumb dom_td tr
 let nav dom_td tr
 let url concat "/?n=" x
 
 assign document.title paren name
 assign document.title concat title " " document.title
 
 dom_width table "100%"
 dom_padding_right nav padding
 dom_valign nav "top"
 dom_align nav "right"
 dom_width nav field_width_small

 //breadcrumb
 
 dom_a breadcrumb "Home" "/"
 dom_separator breadcrumb ">"
 
 dom_a breadcrumb name url 
 dom_separator breadcrumb ">"

 let location to_str location
 let a dom_a breadcrumb title location

 dom_bold a
 dom_color a "black"
 
 //previous
 
 var n dec y
 
 if lt n 0
  assign n dec count
 
 let n concat x "_" n
 let url concat "/?n=" n
 let a dom_a nav "<<" url
 
 dom_separator nav
 
 //next

 var n inc y
 
 if gte n count
  assign n 0
 
 let n concat x "_" n
 let url concat "/?n=" n
 let a dom_a nav ">>" url
 
 dom_br body
 
 //fields
 
 let grid grid_init body "Field" "Value"
 
 forin data
  let v get data k
  let row grid_push grid
  
  dom_text row.field k
  
  let cell cell_init v
  
  if is_str cell
   if is_date cell
    let span dom_span row.value cell
    
    let time time_parse cell
    let time time_hn time
    
    assign row.value.on_tooltip time
   else
    let s to_html cell
  
    dom_html row.value s
   end
  elseif is_cell_image v
   cell_image_resize cell field_width_small   

   dom_push row.value cell   
  else
   dom_push row.value cell   
 end
 
 grid_align grid "field" "right"
 grid_valign grid "top"

 //dom_br body
 
 let div dom_div body
 
 dom_height div line
 
 assign div.onmouseenter partial on_enter div data
end

page-table.name: page-table
page-table.content:
gn page_table x
 check is_uint x

 let table run baserow_cache baserow_database_table x
 let name table.name
 let data run baserow_cache baserow_table x
 let breadcrumb dom_div body
 let url concat "/?n=" x
 
 assign document.title name
 
 dom_a breadcrumb "Home" "/"
 dom_separator breadcrumb ">"
 
 let a dom_a breadcrumb name url
 
 dom_color a "black"
 dom_bold a
 
 dom_br body
 
 if is_empty data
  dom_div body "Empty"
  
  ret
 end

 let columns front data 
 let columns get_keys columns
 
 shift columns 
 unshift columns "#"
 
 let grid grid_init body columns:spread
 
 let tweak from_vw padding
 let tweak mul tweak 2
 
 let width_image from_vw field_width_small
 let width_image add width_image tweak
 let width_image to_vw width_image

 let tweak from_vw "0.5vw"
 
 let line from_vw line
 let line add line tweak
 let line to_vw line
 
 let image_column tbl_find_image_column data
 
 forin data
  let i to_i k
  let v at data i
  let n inc i
  let row v
  let divs grid_push grid
  let divs get_values divs
  
  var column 0
  
  forin row
   let v get row k
   let cell cell_init v
   let div at divs column
   
   if is_str cell
    let s txt_excerpt cell    
    let s to_html s
    
    if same column 1
     let url concat "/?n=" x "_" i
     let a dom_a div "" url

     dom_html a s
    else
     dom_html div s

    if is_date cell
     let time time_parse cell
     let time time_hn time  
     
     assign div.on_tooltip time
    end
   elseif is_cell_image v
    cell_image_resize cell line

    dom_push div cell

    let cell dom_clone cell
    
    cell_image_resize cell field_width_small
    
    assign div.on_tooltip dom_html_outer cell
   else
    dom_push div cell

   if same column 0
    let div front divs
    
    dom_text div n
   elseif same column image_column
    dom_width div width_image
   else
    dom_width div field_width_medium
   
   //~ dom_height div line
   //~ dom_overflow div "hidden"
   //~ dom_white_space div "nowrap"
   //~ dom_text_overflow div "ellipsis"

   assign column inc column
  end
 end 

 grid_align grid "sharp" "right"
 grid_ellipsis grid
end

page-timeline.name: page-timeline
page-timeline.content:
gn page_timeline
 fn compare_date x y
  check is_obj x
  check is_obj y
  
  let left time_parse x.date
  let right time_parse y.date
  
  ret compare left right
 end

 let breadcrumb dom_div body

 assign document.title "Timeline"

 dom_a breadcrumb "Home" "/"
 dom_separator breadcrumb ">"
 
 let a dom_a breadcrumb "Timeline" "/?p=ti"
 
 dom_color a "black"
 dom_bold a
 dom_br body
 
 let div dom_div body "Please, be patient. The query takes 20 seconds to execute the first time."
 let data run tbl_timeline
 
 sort data compare_date
 
 dom_remove div
 
 let grid grid_init body "#" "Date" "Image" "Title" "Field" "Table"

 forin data
  let i to_i k
  let n inc i
  let record at data i
  let row grid_push grid
  //let order k
  
  forin row
   let v get row k
   
   if same k "sharp"
    dom_text v n
    //dom_text v order
   elseif same k "date"
    let text get record k
    let cell cell_init text

    dom_text v cell

    let time time_parse cell
    let time time_hn time
     
    assign row.date.on_tooltip time
   elseif same k "image"
    let text get record k

    if not is_null text
     let cell cell_init text
     
     cell_image_resize cell line

     dom_push v cell

     let cell dom_clone cell

     cell_image_resize cell field_width_small
     
     assign v.on_tooltip dom_html_outer cell
    end
   elseif same k "title"
    let text get record k
    let url concat "/?n=" record.table_id "_" record.row_id
    
    dom_a v text url true
   elseif same k "row_id"
   else
    let text get record k
    
    dom_text v text 
   end
  end  
 end
 
 grid_align grid "sharp" "right"
end

pms-body.name: pms-body
pms-body.content:
fn pms_body
 fn on_logout
  login_reset
  location.reload
 end

 var sibling null
 var children null
 var content null

 if mobile
  dom_padding body padding 
  
  let table dom_table body
  let tr dom_tr table

  assign sibling dom_td tr
  assign children dom_td tr
  assign content dom_div body
  
  dom_width table "100%"
  dom_valign sibling "top"
  dom_valign children "top"  

  dom_width sibling "50%"
  dom_width children "50%"  
 else  
  let table dom_table body
  let tr dom_tr table
  
  assign sibling dom_td tr
  assign content dom_td tr
  assign children dom_td tr

  dom_width sibling "20%"
  dom_width children "20%"
  dom_valign sibling "top"
  dom_valign content "top"
  dom_valign children "top"
 end
 
 let div dom_div content
 
 dom_br div

pms-desktop-slider.name: pms-desktop-slider
pms-desktop-slider.content:
//https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2941189/how-to-overlay-one-div-over-another-div

gn pms_desktop_slider
 let urls arr
 let imgs arr
 let spans arr
 var current_image 0
 var timer -1
 
 fn on_click x
  check is_uint x
  
  forin urls
   let i to_i k
   let img at imgs i
   let span at spans i
   
   dom_display img "none"
   dom_color_background span "indigo"
  end
  
  let img at imgs x
  let span at spans x
  
  dom_display img "inline"
  dom_color_background span "violet"
  
  assign current_image x

  on_move
 end
  
 fn on_move
  let period 4
  
  if gt timer 0
   timer_clear timer
  
  assign timer timer_timeout on_timer period
 end

 fn on_timer x
  assign current_image inc current_image
  
  if gte current_image urls.length
   assign current_image 0

  on_click current_image
 end

 let r dom_div body

 push urls "/palette1.png"
 push urls "/palette2.png"
 push urls "/palette3.png"

 dom_align r "center"

 let tweak from_vw "0.5vw"

 let padding from_vw padding
 let padding mul padding 2
 let padding add padding tweak
 
 let width call dom_window_width
 let width sub width padding 
 let vw_width to_vw width
 var height 0
 
 forin urls
  let i to_i k
  let v at urls i
  let img dom_img r v
  
  dom_position img "absolute"
  dom_top img 0
  dom_left img 0
  dom_width img vw_width
  
  while true
   if img.complete
    brk
    
   yield
  end
    
  assign height max height img.offsetHeight
  
  push imgs img
 end
 
 let vw_height to_vw height
 
 dom_height r vw_height

 forof imgs
  dom_height v vw_height
 end 
  
 let div dom_div r
 let size "2.2mw"
 let padding from_vw "1mw"
 
 dom_height div size
 dom_align div "center"
 
 forin urls
  let i to_i k
  let v at urls i
  let span dom_span div
  
  assign span.onclick partial on_click i
  
  dom_display span "inline-block"
  dom_width span size
  dom_height span size   
  dom_border_radius span border_radius_small
  dom_over span "cursor" "pointer"
  
  let last dec urls.length
  
  if lt i last
   dom_margin_right span padding

  push spans span
 end

 dom_position r "relative"
 dom_width r vw_width
 dom_height r vw_height
 
 let y div.offsetHeight
 let y sub height y padding

 dom_position div "absolute" 
 dom_left div 0
 dom_width div vw_width
 dom_top div y
 
 on_click current_image

 document.addEventListener "mousemove" on_move
  
 ret r
end

pms-login.name: pms-login
pms-login.content:
gn pms_login
 var dlg null
 var mail null
 var password null
 
 gn on_enter x y z
  check is_obj x
  check is_obj y
  check is_obj z
  
  run on_login x y z
 end
 
 gn on_login
  let mail mail.value
  
  if is_empty mail
   run dlg_alert "Mail is required."
   
   ret
  end
  
  if not is_mail mail
   run dlg_alert "Mail is invalid."
   
   ret
  end

  let password password.value

  if is_empty password
   run dlg_alert "Password is required."
   
   ret
  end
      
  let password base36_salt password "mabynogy"
  
  login_update mail password

  if run api_login mail password
   dlg_close dlg
  else
   run dlg_alert "Connexion refused." "Retry"
 end
 
 fn on_cancel x
  check is_obj x
  
  x.preventDefault
 end
 
 let login call login_init

 if run api_login login.mail login.password
  ret

 assign dlg dlg_init "Please, fill the form below to continue."
 
 dom_bold_no dlg.title
 
 //mail
 
 assign mail dlg_push dlg "Mail"

 dom_width mail field_width_medium
 
 assign mail.name "email"
 assign mail.type "email"
 assign mail.value login.mail
 
 //password

 assign password dlg_push dlg "Password"

 dom_width password field_width_medium

 assign password.name "password"
 assign password.type "password"
 assign password.value login.password
 assign password.value base36_unsalt password.value "mabynogy"
 
 //login
 
 let login dlg_button dlg "Login"
 let on_login gn_forward on_login

 assign dlg.dialog.onenter on_login
 assign login.onclick on_login
 dlg.dialog.addEventListener "cancel" on_cancel
 
 run dlg_modal dlg  
end

pms-page-admin-links.name: pms-page-admin-links
pms-page-admin-links.content:
fn pms_page_admin_links x
 check is_obj x

  forof x.children
   dom_visible v "visible"
  end
 end

 fn on_click x
  check is_obj x
  
  on_enter x
 end
 
 fn on_link x y
  check is_obj x
  check is_obj y

  let edit concat "https://admin.pimaastore.com/?q=p," y.id
  let mobile concat "/?n=" y.id "&v=m"
  let desktop concat "/?n=" y.id "&v=d"
  let o obj edit mobile desktop
  let url get o x.value

  open url "_blank"
 end

 let div dom_div body
 let choose "<<choisir>>"
 let edit "Modifier"
 let mobile "Mobile"
 let desktop "Desktop"
 let o obj choose edit mobile desktop
 let select dom_select div o

 dom_padding_top div padding
 dom_visible select "hidden"

 assign div.onmouseenter partial on_enter div
 assign div.onclick partial on_click div
 
 assign select.onchange partial on_link select x
end

pms-page-body.name: pms-page-body
pms-page-body.content:
gn pms_page_body x y
 if is_undef x
  ret run pms_page_body -1 y
  
 check is_int x
 
 if is_undef y
  ret run pms_page_body x -1

 check is_int y
 
 var page null
 var parent_a null
 var title null
 var content null

 if lt x 0
  assign page call db_page_new  
  assign page.parent y
  assign page.title run ui_page_find_title
  assign page.order run api_table_count "page"
 else
  assign page run db_page_init x

 gn on_parent
  let parent run pms_pick_page page.id page.parent
  
  if same parent page.parent
   ret
   
  assign page.parent parent
     
  let title run ui_page_title page.parent

  dom_text parent_a title
 end
 
 gn on_save
  assign page.title trim_r title.value
  assign page.content trim_r content.value
  
  var replace false
  
  if lt page.id 0
   assign page run api_table_insert "page" page
   assign replace true
  else  
   run api_table_update "page" page   

  run dlg_alert "Data saved."

  if replace
   let url concat "/?q=p," page.id
   
   location.replace url
  end
 end
 
 assign document.title "Edit a page"

 let body call pms_body
 let breadcrumb body.breadcrumb
 let content_body body.content
 let children body.children
 
 let node breadcrumb.children.item 0
 
 dom_remove node

 let node breadcrumb.children.item 0

 dom_remove node
 
 let a dom_a breadcrumb "Page list" "/?q=pl" 

 dom_separator breadcrumb ">"

 let b dom_b breadcrumb "Edit a page"
 
 dom_br content_body
 
 let form form_init content_body 
 
 //parent
 
 let div form_push form "Parent" "div"
 let parent_title run ui_page_title page.parent
 
 assign parent_a dom_a div parent_title
 assign parent_a.onclick gn_forward on_parent
 
 //title

 assign title form_push form "Title"
 assign title.value page.title
 
 //content

 assign content form_push form "Content" "textarea"
 assign content.value page.content
 
 //save
 
 assign save form_button form "Save" 
 assign save.onclick gn_forward on_save
 
 //view links
 
 let div dom_div children
 let url concat "https://pimaastore.com/?n=" x
 
 dom_a div "View page" url

 let div dom_div children
 let url concat "/?q=p," x "&v=m"

 dom_a div "Edit page mobile" url
end

pms-page-breadcrumb.name: pms-page-breadcrumb
pms-page-breadcrumb.content:
fn pms_page_breadcrumb x y
 check is_obj x
 check is_uint y
 
 if same x.title "Accueil"
  ret null

 let r dom_div body
 
 let ancestors x.ancestors
 let ancestors tail ancestors y

 dom_a r "Accueil" "/"

 let separator dom_span r " > "
   
 dom_color separator "gray"
  
 forin ancestors
  let i to_i k
  let v at ancestors i

  if same v.title "Accueil"
   cont
   
  dom_a r v.title v.url   
   
  let separator dom_span r " > "
  
  dom_color separator "gray"
 end

 dom_span r x.title
 
 ret r
end

pms-page-cursor.content:
fn pms_page_cursor x
 check is_obj x
 
 if same x.title "Accueil"
  ret null
  
 let r dom_div body
 
 dom_a r "<<" x.previous.url
 dom_separator r 
 dom_a r ">>" x.next.url

 ret r
end

pms-page-desktop-content.name: pms-page-desktop-content
pms-page-desktop-content.content:
fn pms_page_desktop_content x
 check is_obj x

 fn get_siblings x
  check is_obj x
  
  let siblings x.siblings
  
  if is_empty siblings
   ret null
  
  let r dom_div body
  
  dom_align r "right"
  
  forof siblings
   let div dom_div r
   let a dom_a div v.title v.url
   
   dom_class a "menu"
  end
  
  ret r
 end

 fn get_children x
  check is_obj x
  
  let children x.children
  
  if is_empty children
   ret null
  
  let r dom_div body
    
  forof children
   let div dom_div r
   let a dom_a div v.title v.url

   dom_class a "menu"
  end
  
  ret r
 end
 
 dom_br body

 let table dom_table body
 let tr dom_tr table
 let left dom_td tr
 let middle dom_td tr
 let right dom_td tr

 dom_width table "100%"
 dom_width left "20%"
 dom_width right "20%"
 dom_valign left "top"
 dom_valign middle "top"
 dom_valign right "top"

 dom_padding_right left spacing
 dom_padding_right middle spacing
 dom_padding_left middle spacing
 dom_padding_left right spacing

 dom_border_right left border
 dom_border_left right border

 let siblings get_siblings x
 
 if not is_null siblings
  dom_push left siblings
  
 let children get_children x

 if not is_null children
  dom_push right children 
  
 let breadcrumb pms_page_breadcrumb x 3
 
 if not is_null breadcrumb
  let cursor pms_page_cursor x
  let table dom_table body
  let tr dom_tr table
  let left dom_td tr
  let right dom_td tr
  
  dom_width table "100%"
  dom_width right "12mw"
  dom_align right "right"
 
  dom_push left breadcrumb
  dom_push right cursor
  dom_push middle table
  dom_br middle
 end
 
 if is_empty x.ancestors
  dom_remove left
 else
  let div dom_div middle x.title

  dom_bold div
  dom_br middle
 end

 let content dom_div middle
 
 assign content.id "content"
 dom_html content x.content
 
 dom_br middle
end

pms-page-desktop-footer.name: pms-page-desktop-footer

fn pms_page_desktop_footer x

pms-page-desktop-header.name: pms-page-desktop-header
pms-page-desktop-header.content:
fn pms_page_desktop_header x y
 check is_obj x
 check is_arr y
 
 let table dom_table body
 let tr1 dom_tr table
 let tr2 dom_tr table
 let left1 dom_td tr1
 let middle dom_td tr1
 let right1 dom_td tr1
 let left2 dom_td tr2
 let right2 dom_td tr2
 let a dom_a middle "" "/"
 let img dom_img a "/logo.png"

 dom_class a "image-link"
 dom_width table "100%"
 dom_height left1 "6mw"
 dom_height right1 "6mw"
 
 dom_border_bottom left1 border
 dom_border_bottom right1 border
 
 dom_rowspan middle 2
 dom_align middle "center"
 dom_valign middle "bottom"
 
 dom_width left1 "45%"
 dom_align right1 "right"
 dom_width right1 "45%"
 
 dom_width img "12mw"
 
 dom_valign left1 "top"
 dom_valign left2 "bottom"
 dom_valign right2 "bottom"

 dom_align left2 "right"
 
 let social call pms_social
 
 dom_push left1 social
 
 //basket
 
 let a dom_a right1 "" "/?n=1" 
 
 dom_class a "menu"

 let img dom_img a "/basket-512x512.png"

 dom_position img "relative"
 dom_top img "0.2mw"
 dom_width img "1.8mw"

 let span dom_span a " Panier (0)"

 forin y
  let i to_i k
  let v at y i
  let url concat "/?n=" v.id
  var td left2
  let half div y.length 2
  let half trunc half
  var a null
  
  if gte i half
   assign td right2
   
  if same v.title "Recherche"
   assign a dom_a td "" url

   dom_class a "menu"
   
   let img dom_img a "/magnifying-glass-356x293.png"

   dom_width img "1.4mw"
  else
   assign a dom_a td v.title url

pms-page-list-body.name: pms-page-list-body
pms-page-list-body.content:
gn pms_page_list_body
 gn on_page_move x
  check is_obj x

  let page db_page_import x
  let parent run pms_pick_page page.id page.parent
  
  if different parent page.parent
   assign page.parent parent
   
   run api_table_update "page" page
  end   
 end

 gn on_page_add_child x
  check is_obj x

  let url concat "/?q=pn," x.id
  
  open url "_blank"
 end

 gn on_page_up x
  check is_obj x
  
  run ui_page_up x
 end

 gn on_page_down x
  check is_obj x
  
  run ui_page_down x
 end

 gn on_page_top x
  check is_obj x
  
  run ui_page_top x
 end

 gn on_page_bottom x
  check is_obj x
  
  run ui_page_bottom x
 end
 
 gn on_page_delete x
  check is_obj x
  
  if run dlg_confirm
   run ui_page_delete x
 end

 gn on_operation x y
  check is_obj x
  check is_obj y
  
  let up on_page_up
  let down on_page_down
  let top on_page_top
  let bottom on_page_bottom
  let move on_page_move
  let add on_page_add_child
  let delete_ on_page_delete
  let o obj up down top bottom move add delete_
  let gn get o x.value
  
  gn_run gn on_finish y
 end
 
 fn on_finish
  location.reload
 end

 assign document.title "View the page list"

 let body call pms_body
 let breadcrumb body.breadcrumb
 let sibling body.sibling
 let content body.content
 let children body.children
 let a dom_a breadcrumb "Page list" "/?q=pl"
 
 dom_bold a
 dom_color a "black"
 
 let div dom_div children
 let a dom_a div "Add a page" "/?q=pn" true

 dom_br content
 
 let pages run ui_page_find
 let grid grid_init content "Page" "Operations"
 
 dom_width grid.table "100%"
 
 forof pages
  let row grid_push grid
  let td_page row.page
  let td_operation row.operations
  let depth v.ancestors.length
  let indent repeat nbsp depth
  let span dom_span td_page indent
  var title v.title
  
  if is_empty title
   assign title "<<empty>>"
  
  let url concat "/?q=p," v.id
  let a dom_a td_page title url true

  let choose "<<choose>>"
  let up "Up"
  let down "Down"
  let top "Top"
  let bottom "Bottom"
  let move "Move"
  let add "Add"
  let delete_ "Delete"
  let o obj choose up down top bottom move add delete_
  let select dom_select td_operation o
  
  assign select.onchange gn_forward on_operation select v
 end 
 
 if is_empty pages
  let cells grid_push grid
  let td front cells
  
  dom_text td "<<empty>>"
  dom_color td "gray"
 end
 
 let width from_mw "9mw"
 
 grid_column_width grid 1 width
end

pms-pick-page.name: pms-pick-page
pms-pick-page.content:
gn pms_pick_page x y
 check is_int x
 check is_int y

 var r y
 var dlg null
 let parent y
 
 fn on_click x
  check is_int x
  
  assign r x
  
  dlg_close dlg
 end

 fn on_cancel
  assign r parent
  
  dlg_close dlg
 end
 
 fn is_descendant x y
  check is_obj x
  check is_int y
  
  if lt y 0
   ret false
  
  forof x.ancestors
   if same v.id y
    ret true
  end
  
  ret false
 end

 assign dlg dlg_init "Select a page"
 
 let pages run ui_page_find
 
 let div dom_div dlg.container
 let a dom_a div "<<none>>"
 
 if same y -1
  dom_color a "gray"

 dom_align div "left"

 assign a.onclick partial on_click -1
 
 forof pages
  let div dom_div dlg.container
  let depth v.ancestors.length
  let indent repeat nbsp depth
  
  dom_span div indent  
  dom_align div "left"
  
  if same v.id x
   dom_span div v.title
   dom_color div "gray"
  elseif is_descendant v x
   dom_span div v.title
   dom_color div "gray"
  else
   let a dom_a div v.title
   
   if same v.id y
    dom_bold a
    dom_color a "black"
   end
   
   assign a.onclick partial on_click v.id
  end
 end
 
 dom_br dlg.container
 
 //cancel
 
 let cancel dlg_button dlg "Cancel"
 
 assign cancel.onclick partial on_cancel
 
 //modal

 run dlg_modal dlg
 
 ret r
end

rsync.name: rsync
rsync.content:
fn rsync x:spread
 let credential call env_credential 
 
 while true
  log "rsync" x:spread
  
  let r os_execute "sshpass" "-p" credential "rsync" x:spread
  let r trim_r r
  
  if is_full r
   forof split r
    log "rsync>" v
   end
  end

  if contain r "error"
   let n rand 4
   
   sleep n
   cont
  end
  
  ret r
 end
end

salt.name: salt
salt.content:
fn salt x y
 check is_str x
 check is_str y
 check is_full y
 
 let a arr
 
 forin explode x
  let i to_i k
  let v at x i
  let n asc v
  let i mod i y.length
  let v at y i
  let c asc v
  let n xor n c
  let c chr n
  
  push a c
 end
 
 ret implode a
end

fn sitemap_add x y
 check is_obj x
 check is_str y

 let path strip_l y x.prg
 let path strip_l path "/"
 let name path_name path
 let branch path_split path 
 let branch front branch path  
 var id name
 var i 1
 
 while has x.entries id
  assign id name
  assign id concat id "-" i
  assign i inc i
 end
 
 let content file_read path
 let content trim_r content
 let sloc count_sloc content
 let o obj id name branch path sloc content
 
 put x.entries id o
end

fn storage_set x y
 check is_str x
 check is_str y
 
 while true
  try
   localStorage.setItem x y
  catch e
   let keys call storage_keys
   
   if is_empty keys
    throw e
   
   let keys shuffle keys
   let keys head keys 32
   
   forof keys
    storage_remove v
   end
   
   cont
  end
  
  brk
 end
end

syntax-attribute.name: syntax-attribute
syntax-attribute.content:
fn syntax_attribute x
 check is_str x
 
 var r null
 
 if is_lit x
  let s from_json x
  let url concat "/?k=" s
  
  assign r dom_a body x url true
 elseif is_rvalue x
  let url concat "/?k=" x
  
  assign r dom_a body x url true
 elseif is_comment x
  let s strip_l x "//"
  let url concat "/?k=" s
  
  assign r dom_a body x url true
 else
  assign r dom_span body
  
  dom_text r x
 end
 
 let keywords arr "assign" "if" "elseif" "else" "while" "forin" "forof" "fornum" "for" "cont" "continue" "brk" "break" "ret" "return" "null" "run" "not" "end"
 let declarations arr "fn" "function" "gn" "let" "var" "const" 

 if is_comment x
  dom_color r "darkred"
 elseif is_lit x
  dom_color r "darkorange"
 elseif is_numeric x
  dom_color r "green"
 elseif contain keywords x
  dom_color r "darkblue"
  dom_bold r
 elseif contain declarations x
  dom_color r "darkred"
  dom_bold r
 else
  dom_color r "black"
  
 ret r
end

tbl-import-wsl.name: tbl-import-wsl
tbl-import-wsl.content:
fn tbl_import_wsl x y
 check is_arr x
 check is_str y
 
 clear x
 
 let s trim_r y
 let lines split s
 let header shift lines
 let columns arr
 let widths arr
 
 forof split header " "
  if is_empty v
   var width back widths
    
   assign width inc width
   back widths 0 width
  else
   let width inc v.length
   
   push columns v
   push widths width
  end
 end

 forof lines
  var n 0
  let line trim v
  let o obj
  
  forin columns
   let i to_i k
   let last dec columns.length
   let column at columns i
   let width at widths i
   var s line
   
   if same i last
    assign s slice s n   
   else   
    assign s slice line n width
    
   let s trim_r s
   
   put o column s   
   assign n add n width   
  end
  
  push x o
 end 
end

tbl-init.name: tbl-init
tbl-init.content:
fn tbl_init x
 if is_undef x
  let r arr
  
  ret r
 end

 fn convert_arr x
  check is_arr x
  
  let r arr
  
  forin x
   let i to_i k
   let v at x i
   let key i
   let value v
   let o obj key value
   
   push r o
  end
  
  ret r
 end
 
 fn convert_obj x
  check is_obj x
  
  let r arr
  
  forin x
   let v get x k
   let key k
   let value v
   
   if is_txt value
    let lines split value
    
    forof lines
     let value v
     let o obj key value

     push r o
    end
   
   else
    let o obj key value

    push r o
   end
  end

  ret r
 end
 
 if is_arr x
  ret convert_arr x
 
 if is_obj x
  ret convert_obj x
  
 stop
end

tbl-parse.name: tbl-parse
tbl-parse.content:
fn tbl_parse x y
 check is_arr x
 check is_str y
 
 fn to_column x
  check is_str x
  
  let a arr
  
  forof to_lower x
   if is_alnum v
    push a v
   else
    push a " "
  end
  
  let r implode a
  let r replace_rec r "  " " "
  let r trim r  
  let r replace r " " "-"
  
  ret r
 end

 clear x

 let lines split y
 let header shift lines
 let columns split header " "
 let columns reject columns is_empty
 let columns map columns to_column
 
 forof lines
  let cells split v " "
  let cells reject cells is_empty
  
  while gt cells.length columns.length
   let s1 pop cells
   let s2 pop cells
   let s3 space s2 s1
   
   push cells s3
  end
  
  let o zip columns cells
  
  push x o
 end
end

 fn find_image x

   let v get x k

 end
 
 fn has_record x y
  check is_arr x
  check is_obj y
  
  forof x
   if same v.table_id y.table_id
    if same v.row_id y.row_id
     ret true
  end
  
  ret false
 end
 
 let r arr
 let tables run baserow_cache baserow_database_tables
 let data run baserow_cache baserow_tables
 
 forin data
  let name k
  let table_id find_table_id tables name
  let table get data name

   let i to_i k

   let row_id i

    let field k

    if is_date cell
     let date cell     
     let table name
     let columns get_keys v
     let title at columns 1
     let title get v title
     let image find_image v
     
     if is_null title
      cont
      
     let o obj date title image field table table_id row_id

     if has_record r o

     push r o
    end
   end
  end
 end 
 
 ret r
end

time-hn.name: time-hn
time-hn.content:
fn time_hn x
 check is_int x
 
 fn get_unit x
  check is_num x
  
  let minute 60
  let hour mul 60 minute
  let day mul 24 hour
  let month mul 30 day
  let year mul 12 month

  if lt x 10
   let n to_fixed x
   
   ret concat n "s"
  end

  if lt x minute
   let n trunc x
   
   ret concat n "s"
  end
  
  if lt x hour
   let n div x minute
   let n trunc n
   
   ret concat n "m"
  end 
  
  if lt x day
   let n div x hour
   let n trunc n

   ret concat n "h"
  end

  if lt x month
   let n div x day
   let n trunc n
   
   ret concat n "d"
  end

  if lt x year
   let n div x month
   let n trunc n
   
   ret concat n "m"
  end

  let n div x year
  let n trunc n
   
  ret concat n "y"
 end
 
 let now call time_get
 
 if same x now
  ret "now"
 
 if gt x now
  let n sub x now
  let s get_unit n
  
  ret concat "in " s
 end
 
 let n sub now x
 let s get_unit n
  
 ret concat s " ago"
end

time-parse.name: time-parse
time-parse.content:
fn time_parse x
 check is_str x

 fn parse_year x
  check is_str x
  
  if not is_numeric x
   ret false
  
  let n to_uint x
  let d new Date
  
  d.setUTCFullYear n
  d.setUTCMonth 0
  d.setUTCDate 1
  d.setUTCHours 0 0 0 0
  
  ret d.getTime
 end

 fn parse_date x y
  check is_str x
  check is_str y
  
  let a split x y

  if different a.length 3
   ret false
   
  if not every a is_digit
   ret false

  let day shift a
  var day to_uint day
  let month shift a
  let month to_uint month
  let month dec month
  let year shift a
  var year to_uint year
  
  if gt day 31
   let n day
   
   assign day year
   assign year n
  end
  
  check lte day 31
  check lte month 11
  
  let d new Date
  
  d.setUTCFullYear year
  d.setUTCMonth month
  d.setUTCDate day
  d.setUTCHours 0 0 0 0
  
  let r call d.getTime

  if not is_num r
   ret r
   
  let r div r 1000

  ret r
 end

 fn parse_date_time x y
  check is_str x
  check is_str y
  
  let a delimit x y
  let a delimit a ":"
  let a delimit a " "
  
  if different a.length 5
   ret false
   
  if not every a is_digit
   ret false

  let day shift a
  var day to_uint day
  let month shift a
  let month to_uint month
  let month dec month
  let year shift a
  var year to_uint year
  
  if gt day 31
   let n day
   
   assign day year
   assign year n
  end
  
  check lte day 31
  check lte month 11
  
  let hour shift a
  let hour to_uint hour
  let minute shift a
  let minute to_uint minute
  
  check lte hour 24
  check lte minute 60
  
  let d new Date
  
  d.setUTCFullYear year
  d.setUTCMonth month
  d.setUTCDate day
  d.setUTCHours hour minute 0 0
  
  let r call d.getTime

  if not is_num r
   ret r
   
  let r div r 1000

  ret r
 end

 let n parse_year x

 if is_num n
  ret n

 let n parse_date x "/"

 if is_num n
  ret n

 let n parse_date x "-"

 if is_num n
  ret n

 let n parse_date_time x "/"

 if is_num n
  ret n

 let n parse_date_time x "-"

 if is_num n
  ret n
   
 let n Date.parse x
 
 if is_num n
  ret div n 1000
  
 ret false
end

time-string.name: time-string
time-string.content:
fn time_string x
 check is_num x
 
 let d new Date
 let n mul x 1000
 
 d.setTime n
 
 let year call d.getUTCFullYear
 let month call d.getUTCMonth
 let month inc month
 let day call d.getUTCDate
 let hour call  d.getUTCHours
 let minute call d.getUTCMinutes

 var format "date-time"
 
 if same hour 0
  if same minute 0
   assign format "date"
   
   if same month 1
    if same day 1
     assign format "year"
    end
   end
    
  end
 end

 let month pad_l month "0" 2
 let day pad_l day "0" 2
 let hour pad_l hour "0" 2  
 let minute pad_l minute "0" 2  
 
 if same format "date-time"
  let r concat year "/" month "/" day
  let r concat r " " hour ":" minute
  
  ret r
 elseif same format "date"  
  ret concat year "/" month "/" day
 elseif same format "year"
  ret to_str year
 else
  stop
 end
end

    let s2 to_base36 n2

    assign r concat r s1 s2

    stop
  end
  
  ret r
 else

end

fn txt_excerpt x y
 check is_str x
 
 if is_undef y
  ret txt_excerpt x 512
 
 let r x
 let r trim_r r
 let r split r
 let r head r 4
 var r join r
 let s r
 
 while gt r.length y
  assign r split r " "
  
  pop r
  
  assign r join r " "
  assign r trim_r r
 end
 
 if is_empty r
  assign r s
  
 assign r head r y
 
 if same r x
  ret x
 
 assign r unpunct_r r
 
 if different r x
  assign r concat r " ..."
 
 ret r
end

ui-page-list.name: ui-page-list
ui-page-list.content:
gn ui_page_list
 fn get_page x y
  check is_arr x
  check is_int y
  
  forof x
   if same v.id y
    ret v
  end
  
  ret null
 end
 
 fn get_ancestors x y
  check is_obj x
  check is_arr y
  
  let r arr
  var v x
  
  while true
   let o get_ancestor v y
   
   if is_null o
    brk
    
   unshift r o
   assign v o  
  end
  
  ret r
 end

 fn get_ancestor x y
  check is_obj x
  check is_arr y
  
  if is_null x.parent
   ret null
  
  forof y
   if same v.id x.parent.id
    ret v
  end
  
  stop
 end
 
 fn get_siblings x y
  check is_obj x
  check is_arr y
  
  let r arr
  let a arr
  
  if is_null x.parent
   append a y
  else
   append a x.parent.children
   
  forof a
   if same v.id x.id
    cont
    
   push r v
  end
  
  ret r
 end

 fn apply_siblings x y
  check is_obj x
  check is_arr y
  
  assign x.siblings get_siblings x y
  
  forof x.children   
   apply_siblings v x.children
  end
 end

 fn compare_order x y
  check is_obj x
  check is_obj y
  
  ret compare x.order y.order
 end
 
 let r run api_table_select "page"
 
 forof r
  assign v.parent get_page r v.parent
 end
 
 sort r compare_order 
 
 let r to_tree r
 let r to_flat r

 var previous null
 
 if is_full r
  assign previous back r
 
 forin r
  let i to_i k
  let v at r i
  
  assign v.ancestors get_ancestors v r
  
  var next null
  let last dec r.length
  
  if same i last
   assign next front r
  else
   let n inc i
   
   assign next at r n
  end
  
  assign v.previous previous
  assign v.next next
  
  assign previous v
 end
 
 let r to_tree r
 
 forof r
  apply_siblings v r
 end

 ret r
end

unit-file-list.name: unit-file-list
unit-file-list.content:
fn unit_file_list x y
 check is_obj x
 
 if is_undef y
  ret unit_file_list x ""
  
 check is_str y

 let columns arr "#" "name" "branch" "lang" "size" "sloc"
 
 if is_full y
  let n find columns "branch"
  
  remove columns n
 end
 
 let grid grid_init body columns:spread
 let a get_values x
 let lang_slocs obj
 let lang_sizes obj
 var n 1
 var total_sloc 0
 var total_size 0
 
 forin a
  let i to_i k
  let v at a i

  if is_full y
   if different y v.branch
    cont

  let row grid_push grid
  let ext path_ext v.path
  let sloc v.sloc
  let size v.content.length
  let bsize to_bsize size
  let url_name concat "/" v.id "/"
  let url_branch concat "/?b=" v.branch
  
  dom_a row.name v.name url_name true
  
  if is_empty y
   dom_a row.branch v.branch url_branch true
  
  dom_text row.sharp n
  dom_text row.lang ext
  dom_text row.size bsize
  dom_text row.sloc sloc
  
  let lang_sloc get lang_slocs ext 0
  let lang_sloc add lang_sloc sloc
  
  set lang_slocs ext lang_sloc

  let lang_size get lang_sizes ext 0
  let lang_size add lang_size size
  
  set lang_sizes ext lang_size
  
  assign n inc n
  assign total_sloc add total_sloc v.sloc
  assign total_size add total_size v.content.length
 end
 
 forin lang_slocs
  let row grid_push grid
  let sloc get lang_slocs k
  let size get lang_sizes k
  let bsize to_bsize size
  
  dom_text row.name k
  dom_align row.name "right"
  dom_text row.size bsize
  dom_text row.sloc sloc
 end
 
 let row grid_push grid
 let size to_bsize total_size
 
 dom_text row.name "Total"
 dom_align row.name "right"
 dom_text row.size size
 dom_text row.sloc total_sloc
 
 grid_align grid "sharp" "right"
 grid_align grid "size" "right"
 grid_align grid "sloc" "right"  
 grid_ellipsis grid
end

xhr-load.name: xhr-load
xhr-load.content:
gn xhr_load x
 check is_str x
 
 var result null
 let timeout 8
 let xhr new XMLHttpRequest
 
 fn on_ready_state_change x
  if same xhr.readyState xhr.DONE
   assign result xhr.response
  end
 end
 
 xhr.open "get" x

 assign xhr.onreadystatechange on_ready_state_change
 
 xhr.send
  
 let begin call time_now
 
 while true
  if is_str result
   brk
   
  let end call time_now
  let time sub end begin
  
  if gt time timeout
   stop
  
  yield
 end
 
 if is_json result
  ret from_json result
 
 ret result
end

xhr-post.name: xhr-post
xhr-post.content:
gn xhr_post x y
 check is_str x
 check is_str y
 
 var result null
 let timeout 4
 let xhr new XMLHttpRequest
 
 fn on_ready_state_change x
  if same xhr.readyState xhr.DONE
   assign result xhr.response
  end
 end
 
 xhr.open "post" x

 assign xhr.onreadystatechange on_ready_state_change
 
 xhr.setRequestHeader "content-type" "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"
 
 let u encodeURIComponent y
 let u concat "u=" u
 
 xhr.send u
  
 let begin call time_now
 
 while true
  if is_str result
   brk
   
  let end call time_now
  let time sub end begin
  
  if gt time timeout
   stop
  
  yield
 end
 
 ret result
end

xn-call.name: xn-call
xn-call.content:
gn xn_call x y:spread
 check is_xn x
 
 if is_fn x
  ret x y:spread
 elseif is_gn x
  ret run x y:spread
 else
  stop
end

xor.name: xor
xor.content:
fn xor x y z:spread
 check different y 0
 
 let n inline "x^y"
 
 if is_empty z
  ret n
 
 ret xor n z:spread
end

zip.name: zip
zip.content:
fn zip x y
 check is_arr x
 check is_arr y
 check same x.length y.length
 
 let r obj
 
 forin x
  let i to_i k
  let key at x i
  let value at y i
  
  put r key value
 end
 
 ret r
end
